column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: The Ministry of Health has announced an additional five new cases of COVID-19 this evening
column4: bringing the total number of confirmed infections discovered so far in Cambodia to 96.------Of the five new cases discovered on March 25
column5: two were in Preah Sihanouk province; a ------64-year-old French man and a 60-year-old French woman------ in Phnom Penh.------The latest cases reported this evening are a 59-year-old man in Kandal
column6: a 37-year-old man in Siem Reap and a man in Phnom Penh (*his details are sketchy so far).------Four patients were reported to have fully recovered today
column7: totaling ten 10; eight Cambodians and two foreigners.------ ------VERY DETAILED MAP OF OUTBREAK
